name: New-Project-Starter-Kit
title: New Project Starter Kit
description: Start new projects with webpack, Babel, Sass, PostCSS, Eleventy, PWA, service workers, JShint, and Netlify CMS installed and configured, with some common accessible HTML, CSS, and JS components and patterns. Includes deployment configuration for Netlify and Zeit Now.

scripts.clean: npm run clean:dist & npm run clean:js & npm run clean:css & npm run clean:fonts & npm run clean:img
scripts.clean:dist: if [ -e dist ]; then rm -R dist; fi
scripts.clean:js: if [ -e src/js ]; then rm -R src/js; fi
scripts.clean:css: if [ -e src/css ]; then rm -R src/css; fi
scripts.clean:fonts: if [ -e src/fonts ]; then rm -R src/fonts; fi
scripts.clean:img: if [ -e src/img ]; then rm -R src/img; fi
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run webpack
